reviews.review: The Source engine're pushing this game more forward, is a remake of counter-strike 1.6, but with new engine, the bot system're more improved&Challengeing, they're more harder than the condition zero's bots, also, the weapon handling're completely changed, including the recoil, still, weapons're more greater now, including the model&shooting, the Playermodel're Remaked, they're more like 1.6's model now, still, the hitboxes're more improved, now is more easy to headshot, i recommend you invite some friends, and play with bots, still, i hope the developer add training course which will help those new players who just got in to the game, Cheers, Cliffe and Minh.

It's pretty good. Never played it but I imagine it's alright.

Counter Strike was originally a mod made by two people for Half-Life Classic. It quickly became one of the most popular online shooters of its time and valve saw this as an opportunity, eventually hiring the two creators of the mod.

These two modders then went on to help valve design the current source engine (hence the name Counter Strike "Source") now used in all of Valve's games such as Team Fortress 2, Half Life 2, Portal and of course, Counter Strike. 

This engine is now widely renowned as one of the best engines in video gaming, and has also been used in totally different genres of video games such as Vindictus, Nexon's new MMO, showing its versatility.
This game is a super fun First Person Shooter, but I think some of the hitboxes are kinda weird. Still a fun game though!
